flawed_nl_solution:
The medical cost comes out to 45*10+250=$<<45*10+250=695>>695
Insurance covers 695*0.8=$<<695*0.8=556>>556
So he has to pay 695-556=$<<695-556=139>>139
Added to the cost of the trip he has to pay 1200+139=$<<1200+139=1339>>1339

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 700, not 695. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
